verbs.description: [V: sneak] [ARG1: peek] given on albany county nursing home renovations albany county officials gave a sneak peak of the multi - million - dollar nursing home renovation thursday which is expected to be completed by 2020 the project includes adding square - footage to all six wings of the albany county nursing home and making it a more welcoming place for residents and their visitors albany albany county albany county new york colonie new york larry slatky colonie county albany county nursing home executive director home colonie town paula mahan
